description:
This is our first get together and getting to know each other.


Come and meet everyone and let all your entrepreneurial friends know. This meet-up is for everyone who has a business, wants to start a business or is not quite sure yet. Everyone is welcome.

If you have any questions or comments feel free to ask.

See you there.

John
how_to_find_us: It's about 300m from Place Luxembourg towards Metro Trone. It's a bistro cafe and I reserved the mezzanine for us. As it is a cafe you will be asked to have a drink, I hope that is okay.
name: First get to know each other and time for the first chat

description:
The last meeting was great and I really enjoyed meeting you all. As I already mentioned, the idea of the meetings is to help you to get going with your endeavour, to connect you to other people and at the same time to prepare the Entrepreneur Academy. In this meeting I want to tell you more about this and how the academy can help you.

So spread the word and invite anyone with entrepreneurial spirit to join our group and come to our meetings.

By the way, you are always welcome to contact me directly if you have any specific questions. I am happy to help.

See you soon

Cheers John
how_to_find_us: Still open, but it is going to be a nice place around Ixelles or Etterbeek ;)
name: Welcome of new members and a lot more about the Entrepreneur Academy
